title: Коп з минулого
overview: Police captain Oleh Dolin opens his eyes in a hospital bed and learns that he has been in a coma for about 20 years. During this time, the world has changed, the militia has turned into the police, rackets and "brothers" have become a thing of the past, and in the current reality, everyone is "sitting" in gadgets, shooting blogs, and, quite surprisingly, eating sushi with drumsticks. For the "newcomer" from the bad 90s, who has kept professional skills, the heart and soul of a young guy, there will be a job in the new police force. After all, as before, bad guys do bad things...Based on the format of the German series Der Lezte Bulle.
